alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 7:40PM CDT until July 13 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR WESTERN CIMARRON COUNTY... At 740 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Wheeless, or 20 miles northeast of Clayton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Kenton, Wheeless, Black Mesa Park and Felt. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
